courses.name: Design Thinking
courses.overview: Come and learn problem solving even if you have no experience in technology. This course will help you build a strong base on the fundamentals of designing an architecture. Be the creator of new technologies with limits as far as your imagination goes! All beginners are welcome here!
courses.description: At Aurask we help you identify the core problems and build a mindset of ambiguity solving. We have personalized learning for the final year students, freshers and working professionals. You'll learn foundation skills while attaining niche technology learning of solving Business Process Management.

pricing.title: Self Tutorial
pricing.description: Includes pre-recorded videos, live QnA doubt session, Lifetime access to the course.

pricing.title: Live Session
pricing.description: 2 Day workshop from industry experts. Also includes pre-recorded videos, live QnA doubt session

syllabus.title: Enterprise Design
content: Lego based bottoms up design pattern

syllabus.title: Process oriented mindset
content: Automated routing : Push and Pull Routing
Alternate ways to execute business process

syllabus.title: Release Management
content: Devops release pipeline : Continuous integration and Delivery

courses.name: Architecture Mindset
courses.description: This course will help you build a strong base on the fundamentals of designing long term architecture. Be the creator of new technologies with limits as far as your imagination goes! All beginners are welcome here!
courses.overview: Come and learn an abstract way of building technology solutions while utilizing the latest technology from digitisation and automation. You will establish the architecture thought process that covers customer-focused solutions and build components that can be reused.

pricing.title: Self Tutorial
pricing.description: Includes pre-recorded videos, live QnA doubt session, Lifetime access to the course.

content: Design UX patterns to optimize performance

syllabus.title: Security Management
content: Roles and Access Groups and Security Mode

courses.name: Product Evolution
courses.description: Learn the art of working backwards from customers, Identifying the core business by the method of use cases, removing unwanted problems from today's business, we perform Decision making with the help of Data and providing value to our customers in a continuous manner. Created especially for working professionals who have long experience and managers to enhance their career goals.
courses.overview: Come and learn long term product building strategy even if you have no experience in business and technology. Here you will be learning all that there is to know about product management. All beginners are welcome here!

pricing.title: Self Tutorial
pricing.description: Includes pre-recorded videos, live QnA doubt session, Lifetime access to the course.

syllabus.title: Agile implementation
content: People skills focused on user Behaviour

courses.name: Leadership Journey
courses.description: Result Oriented leadership have always valued the take of an Entrepreneur on Understanding, Influencing shareholders, getting promotion from a manager to a leader and continuously creating innovative and useful products. It's built specifically for managers and entrepreneurs, to help them to reach to the next level of leadership or business.
